mapper.insert: insert into user (password, username, telephone, email, role, last_login_time, specialty, office, qiniu_id, type) values (#{password}, #{username}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{role}, #{last_login_time}, #{specialty}, #{office}, #{qiniu_id}, #{type});
mapper.update: update user set user_id = #{userId}, username = #{username}, qiniu_id = #{qiniuId}, password = #{password}, telephone = #{telephone}, email = #{email}, role = #{role}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, specialty = #{specialty}, office = #{office}, type = #{type}
